Translations.Text: Ubwo umuntu utabona (Abdullah bin Umm-Maktum) yari aje ayisanga (igihe yigishaga bamwe mu bikomerezwa by’Abakurayishi)
Nonese ni iki cyakumenyesha ko yaba (aje kubaza) ashaka kwiyeza (ibyaha)
Cyangwa akakira urwibutso, hanyuma urwibutso rukamugirira akamaro
Naho wawundi wirata yumva ko adakeneye (kuyoboka)
Kandi ntacyo wabazwa aramutse atiyejeje (ngo ave mu buhakanyi, kuko wowe icyo ushinzwe ari ugusohoza ubutumwa bwa Allah gusa)
Oya ntibikwiye! Mu by’ukuri (iyi Qur’an) ni urwibutso
(Iri) mu nyandiko zirinzwe mu cyubahiro (Lawuhu Mahfudh)
Umuntu (w’umuhakanyi) navumwe! Mbega ukuntu ari umuhakanyi
Yamuremye mu ntanga, arangije amugenera uko azabaho
Uko tumanura amazi (mu kirere) yisuka ari menshi
Nuko tugasatura ubutaka uko bikwiye (kugira ngo amazi abashe kubwinjiramo)
Kugira ngo bibagirire akamaro, mwe n’amatungo yanyu
Ariko ubwo urusaku ruziba amatwi (impanda y’imperuka) ruzaza
Uwo munsi umuntu azahunga umuvandimwe we
Kuri uwo munsi, buri muntu azaba afite ibimuhangayikishije (bituma atita ku bandi)
Kuri uwo munsi, uburanga (bw’abemeramana) buzaba bwererana
Naho uburanga (bw’abahakanyi) kuri uwo munsi buzaba bwuzuye umukungugu
Abo ni bo bahakanyi b’inkozi z’ibibi
N’igihe imisozi izakurwa mu myanya yayo
N’igihe roho zizasubizwa mu mibiri yazo (abeza bakajya ukwabo n’ababi bakajya ukwabo)
N’igihe umwana w’umukobwa wahambwe ari muzima azabazwa
N’igihe ibitabo (bikubiyemo ibikorwa byiza n’ibibi bya buri muntu) bizaramburwa
Icyo gihe buri muntu azamenya ibyo yakoze
Bityo, ndahiriye ku nyenyeri zitagaragara ku manywa zikongera kugaragara nijoro
Mu by’ukuri, (Qur’an) ni ijambo ryazanywe n’Intumwa yubahitse [(Malayika Jibrilu), (riturutse kwa Allah)
(Iyo ntumwa) ifite imbaraga (yahawe na Allah), Nyagasani w’intebe y’icyubahiro
Yumvirwa (n’abamalayika mu birere) kandi ikaba yizewe (kwa Allah)
Kandi (yemwe bahakanyi) mugenzi wanyu (Intumwa Muhamadi ibakomokamo) si umusazi
Kandi rwose yabonye (Malayika Jibrilu) ari mu kirere gikeye
Kandi (Intumwa Muhamadi) ntigundira ibyo yahishuriwe (ngo ireke kubyigisha abantu)
Kandi (Qur’an) si ijambo rya Shitani wavumwe
Mu by’ukuri, iyi (Qur’an) nta kindi iri cyo usibye kuba ari urwibutso ku biremwa (byose)
Kuri wawundi muri mwe ushaka gukurikira inzira igororotse
Kandi nta cyo mwashaka (ngo kibe) keretse Allah, Nyagasani w’ibiremwa (byose) aramutse agishatse
